TRANSPORT DEPARTMENT
ACQUISITION OF LANDS
[G.O. Ms. No. 30, Transport (1.1), 7th March 2019, மாசி 23, விளம்பி, திருவள்ளுவர் ஆண்டு-2050./
No. II(2)/TRA/212(f-1)/2019.
The Government of Tamil Nadu has been satisfied that the lands specified in the schedule below have to be acquired due for industrial purposes to wit for a formation of Tindivanam to Nagari New Broad Gauge Railway Line, and it having already been decided that the entire amount of compensation to be awarded for the lands is to be paid out of the lands controlled or managed by Southern Railway. The following notice is issued under sub-section (1) of Section 3 of the Tamil Nadu Acquisition of land for Industrial Purposes Act, 1997 (Tamil Nadu Act 10 of 1999).
[Regd. No. TN/CCN/467/2012-14. [R. Dis. No. 197/2009. [Price: Rs. 11.20 Paise.
NOTIFICATIONS BY GOVERNMENT
NOTICE
Under sub-section (1) of Section 3 of the Tamil Nadu Acquisition of Land for Industrial Purposes Act, 1997 (Tamil Nadu Act 10 of 1999), the Governor of Tamil Nadu hereby acquires the lands in No.05, Kolathur Village in respect of Pallipattu Taluk of Tiruvallur District as specified in the Schedule below and measuring 116985 Sq.meters to the same, a little more or less needed for industrial purposes, to wit, for formation of Tindivanam to Nagari New Broad Gauge Railway Line.
The plan of the lands kept in the Office of the Land Acquisition Officer and District Revenue Officer, Tiruvallur and Office of the Special Tahsildar, (LA), Taluk Office @ Pallipattu
